title: Delay on skill casting
body:
Recently I have played a fair bit of Brand and Veigar and have found them to be a bit problematic. (Veigar more so since the update)

I don't have a problem with the mechanics but I am finding that the skills I click never go off. I have been checking that I wasn't under any cc but still any skill shots I try to quickly fire off never work. I can do it perfectly fine on any other champion but I have problems with these two. 

Another thing with brand I find his E, Conflagration, won't go off if they champion you are casting it on moves out of range while he is in the process of casting it.

Also Veigars Stun, the 0.75 makes it pretty useless. They have to be pretty dumb to not move out of the way and it makes them so easy to dodge his W now, which means goodbye combo. 

Anyone else having any of these problems?
